fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **KYS**: Choose a player each night. You will tell them to kill themselves NOW! If their attack value is higher than their defense value, they will commit suicide. If not, nothing happens.
- **KMS**: Disgusted with your ways, you can choose to tell yourself to die instead. Should you commit this noble sacrifice, you may choose to revive one of the players who's suicide you have indirectly caused.
